title: Authors and Citation
text: Bodin (2025). DDFConverter: Convert dataset DDF-filesystem. R package version 0.1.0, https://statistikkonsulterna.github.io/DDFConverter/.
code: @Manual{,   title = {DDFConverter: Convert a dataset into a DDF-filesystem},   author = {Amelia Bodin},   year = {2025},   note = {R package version 0.1.0},   url = {https://statistikkonsulterna.github.io/DDFConverter/}, }

what: Convert a dataset into a DDF-filesystem
title: Convert a dataset into a DDF-filesystem
text: R-package uses existing dataset easily transforms DDF-filesystem, can used Vizabi tool. Five functions included; create_concepts creates concepts-file. create_entities creates entities-file. create_datapoints creates datapoint-files. create_tags creates tag-file. create_ddf creates entire filesystem containing concepts, entities, tags datapoints. NOTE: datapackage-generator included. validate DDF-filesystem use built-validator Gapminder Offline-tool, terminal. info validating : https://github.com/Gapminder/ddf-validation.

title: Convert a dataset into a DDF-filesystem
text: Use following block code download package able use R Environment.

title: Create Concept-file — create_concepts
code: create_concepts(   dataset,   variable_id,   variable_name,   entity_id,   description = NULL,   source = NULL,   name_short = NULL,   name_catalog = NULL,   tag_id = NULL,   output_folder = getwd(),   return_output = FALSE )

title: Create Concept-file — create_concepts
text: dataset data frame. data set converted. Data wide-format. variable_id character variable. ID connected variable. include lower case letters underscores. variable_name character variable. Name variable. entity_id character variable. ID connected entity. include lower case letters underscores. description (Optional) character variable. definition variable. include commas semi-colons. source (Optional) character variable. source variable. Preferably URL source. name_short (Optional) character variable. shortened version variable name. name_catalog (Optional) character variable. variable name shown catalog / tree menu. tag_id (Optional) character variable. ID specifying folder variable belongs . include lower case letters underscores. output_folder (Optional) file saved. default set working directory. return_output Returns output. Default = FALSE

title: Create Concept-file — create_concepts
text: Saves CSV-file given output-folder named "ddf–concepts". file includes one row named variable always includes geo, year, name, domain, entity_id, data-variables given, relevant variables.

title: Create Concept-file — create_concepts
code: if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{ create_concepts(dataset = dataset, variable_id = "var_id", variable_name = "Variable", entity_id = "reg_id", source = "source_url") } # }

title: Create datapoint-files — create_datapoints
text: function creates one datapoint-file variable data set DDF-format

title: Create datapoint-files — create_datapoints
code: create_datapoints(   dataset,   entity_id,   variable_id,   datacolumns,   output_folder = getwd() )

title: Create datapoint-files — create_datapoints
text: dataset data frame. data set converted. Data wide-format. entity_id character variable. ID connected entity. include lower case letters underscores. variable_id character variable. ID connected variable. include lower case letters underscores. datacolumns range numeric variables. columns including data. referenced format "1-3" "1,2,3" output_folder (Optional) file saved. default set working directory.

title: Create datapoint-files — create_datapoints
text: Saves folder given output-folder named "ddf–datapoints". folder includes one CSV-file unique variable data set.

title: Create datapoint-files — create_datapoints
code: if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{ create_datapoints(dataset = dataset, variable_id = "var_id", entity_id = "reg_id", datacolumns = "7-21", output_folder = get_wd()) } # }

title: Create DDF-filesystem — create_ddf
code: create_ddf(   dataset,   variable_id,   variable_name,   entity_id,   entity_name,   datacolumns,   tag_id,   tag_name,   name_short = NULL,   name_catalog = NULL,   description = NULL,   source = NULL,   parent = NULL,   output_folder = getwd() )

title: Create DDF-filesystem — create_ddf
text: dataset data frame. data set converted. Data wide-format. variable_id character variable. ID connected variable. include lower case letters underscores. variable_name character variable. Name variable. entity_id character variable. ID connected entity. include lower case letters underscores. entity_name character variable. Name entity. datacolumns range numeric variables. columns including data. referenced format "1-3" "1,2,3" tag_id character variable. ID connected variable. include lower case letters underscores. tag_name character variable. Name variable. name_short (Optional) character variable. shortened version variable name. name_catalog (Optional) character variable. variable name shown catalog / tree menu. description (Optional) character variable. definition variable. include commas semi-colons. source (Optional) character variable. source variable. Preferably URL source. parent (Optional) character variable. definition variable. include commas semi-colons. output_folder (Optional) file saved. default set working directory.

title: Create DDF-filesystem — create_ddf
text: Saves folder given output-folder named "ddf_filesystem_current_date". folder includes concepts-files, entities-file folder containing datapoints.

title: Create DDF-filesystem — create_ddf
code: if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{ create_ddf(dataset = dataset, variable_id = "var_id", variable_name = "Variable", entity_id = "reg_id", entity_name = "Region", datacolumns = "7-21", description = "description", output_folder = get_wd()) } # }

title: Create Entity-file — create_entities
text: dataset data frame. data set converted. Data wide-format. entity_id character variable. ID connected entity. include lower case letters underscores. entity_name character variable. Name entity. output_folder (Optional) file saved. default set working directory.

title: Create Entity-file — create_entities
text: Saves CSV-file given output-folder named "ddf–entities–geo–entity_id". file includes one row entity, connecting ID name.

title: Create Entity-file — create_entities
code: if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{ create_entities(dataset = dataset, entity_id = "reg_id", entity_name = "Region", output_folder = "path/to/folder") } # }

title: Create Tag-file — create_tags
code: create_tags(dataset, tag_id, tag_name, parent = NULL, output_folder = getwd())

title: Create Tag-file — create_tags
text: dataset data frame. data set converted. Data wide-format. tag_id character variable. ID connected variable. include lower case letters underscores. tag_name character variable. Name variable. parent (Optional) character variable. definition variable. include commas semi-colons. output_folder (Optional) file saved. default set working directory.

title: Create Tag-file — create_tags
text: Saves CSV-file given output-folder named "ddf–entities–tag". file includes one row named tag ID name, optionally parent tag.

title: Create Tag-file — create_tags
code: if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{ create_tags(dataset = dataset, tag_id = "tag_id", tag_name = "Name",  output_folder = "path/to/folder") } # }
